channel.title: How to edit 2 things
channel.description: how do i edit the strength bonus of armor because my guthans gives like +80 str bonus...also how do i edit how fast you can eat? please help if you know how..keep in mind im a noob so i need step by step

item.title: How to edit 2 things
item.dc:creator: @mrslayer mrslayer
item.description:
@mrslayer wrote:

ok look up the guthans id in your item.cfg to open that right click on it click on open with and click notepad then when your in there look for ether
4724 = helm
4726 = warspear
4728 = plate
4730 = skirt

then under any of them you should see this:

63377.3753241266	63377.3753241266	83312.2081494279	0	0	0	-6	-2	55	58	54	-1	62	0	0

ok the first numbers are how much the item costs and the outher numbers are the bonus just look for the bonus you want to change it will say like 83 or what ever your str bonus for that item is and dont forget to change all the parts of guthans.[br][size=1]Posted on: September 13, 2007, 09:39:59 PM[/size][hr][quote=“itzkyle, post:2, topic:143141”]!)Item.jaa find the id the first 3 #'s are dont mess with its the 11 #s after them[/quote] ok what? that dosent make since at all and its worng it isent item.java it item.cfg…

Read full topic
